TestCase.name: query 1
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view t_select as select * from t;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_select]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 2
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_select_aggregate as select v1, C from ( select v1, v2, count(*) as C from t group by v1, v2);

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_select_aggregate]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], c=[$2], v2=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 3
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_inner_join as select * from t as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v2;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 4
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_join as select * from t as t1 left join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 5
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_right_join as select * from t as t1 right join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_right_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 6
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_full_join as select * from t as t1 full join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_full_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 7
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_group_inner_join as select * from (select v1, v2, count(*) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_group_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 8
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_left_group_right_group_inner_join as select * from (select v1, v2, count(*) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join (select v1, v2, avg(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t2 on t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_left_group_right_group_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], EXPR$2=[/(CAST($3):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $4)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($2)], agg#2=[COUNT($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 9
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_two_condition_inner_join as select * from t as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v2 and t1.v2 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_two_condition_inner_join]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), =($1, $4))], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 10
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_wrong_case_shuffle_agg as select t1.v1 from (select v1, v2, sum(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t1 join (select v1, v2, avg(v3) from t group by v1, v2) as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_wrong_case_shuffle_agg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], v10=[$2], v20=[$3]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($2)], agg#2=[COUNT($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 11
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_wrong_case_two_phase_agg as select t1.v1 from (select v1, sum(v3) from t group by v1) as t1 join (select v1, avg(v3) from t group by v1) as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_wrong_case_two_phase_agg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v10=[$1]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], EXPR$1=[SUM($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], agg#1=[SUM($2)], agg#2=[$SUM0($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($1)], agg#2=[COUNT($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 12
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_changed_collation as select * from t as t1 join t as t2 on t1.v1 = t2.v2 and t1.v2 = t2.v1 order by t1.v1 DESC, t2.v3, t2.v2 ASC;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_changed_collation], collation=[[0 DESC, 6, 5]]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $5), =($1, $4))], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id])

TestCase.name: query 13
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view t_avg_sum_count as select round(avg(v1), 1) as avg_v1, sum(v2) as sum_v2, count(v3) as count_v3 from t;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_avg_sum_count]) RwStreamProject(avg_v1=[ROUND($STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, /(CAST($1):DECIMAL(28,10), $2)), 1)], sum_v2=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $3)], count_v3=[$0], $f1=[$1], $f2=[$2], sum_v2_copy=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[$SUM0($0)], agg#1=[SUM($1)], agg#2=[$SUM0($2)], sum_v2=[SUM($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($0)], agg#2=[COUNT($0)], sum_v2=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,_row_id])
